text: Valeria del Campo Guti√©rrez (born 15 February 2000), is a Costa Rican football player. She plays as a centre back for the C.F. Monterrey team in the Mexican Liga MX Femenil league. She is also a part of the Costa Rica women's national team. Del Campo played a crucial role in helping C.F. Monterrey win the Apertura title in the 2021-22 season. Her contribution made her the first Costa Rican player to be a part of a championship-winning team in the Liga MX Femenil. Valeria del Campo made her debut for the Costa Rica national team on 3rd August 2019 when they played against Argentina during the 2019 Pan American Games. == References == Category:2000 births Category:Living people
title: Valeria del Campo
